meta.title: IndusTechSol – The Project Operating System for Engineering & Construction
meta.description: DiPGOS unifies CPDS, ACCS, and AOS into a single intelligent platform. From proposal to operations, experience seamless, AI‑powered project delivery.

hero.headline: We are Shaping the Future of Engineering & Construction
hero.subheadline: Introducing DiPGOS – the world's first Project Operating System

intro.line1: Until now, construction ran on fragmented tools. Now it runs on an Operating System.
intro.line2: DiPGOS – design, execution, and operations unified in a single intelligent platform.

dipgosDescription.paragraph: DiPGOS is a domain-built Operating System for engineering and construction delivery. It provides a unified, integrated view of project operations and control by treating construction activities as production systems rather than isolated tasks.

ontology.heading: System Ontology – Built for Complexity
ontology.description: Every project is broken down into a universal, scalable hierarchy that ensures consistency across all phases:

products.heading: Three Products, One Unified Platform
products.intro: Seamlessly move from proposal to construction to maintenance with purpose‑built studios that share the same intelligent core.

items.name: CPDS
items.description: Turn RFPs into structured proposals. AI extracts scopes, BOQ, schedules and builds a traceable process with an n8n‑like flow canvas.

items.name: ACCS
items.description: Monitor execution in real‑time. AI compares as‑built against the plan, predicts delays, and automates compliance checks.

items.name: AOS
items.description: Extend asset life with AI‑driven maintenance schedules, real‑time sensor integration, and automated work orders.

aiCapabilities.heading: Physical AI – Intelligence That Understands Reality

features.title: Physics‑Informed AI
features.description: Our models are trained on construction domain knowledge, not just generic data – they understand loads, materials, and sequences.

features.title: Knowledge Retrieval from Past Work
features.description: Leverage historical project data (KR) to generate better proposals, estimate risks, and reuse proven workflows.

features.title: Conversational AI Assistant
features.description: Chat with your project data. Ask “What are the unresolved requirements?” or “Show me all operations that need a crane.”

features.title: Applied AI in Proposal Making
features.description: Auto‑populate BOQ, suggest scopes based on performance history, and flag compliance gaps before submission.

painPoints.heading: Solving the Real Pain Points of Construction

points.title: Fragmented Collaboration
points.solution: One source of truth for all stakeholders – estimators, engineers, compliance officers, and site teams.

points.title: Slow, Error‑Prone Updates
points.solution: Change a scope and watch it propagate instantly to BOQ, schedule, and compliance matrices.

points.title: Delayed BOQ Approvals
points.solution: AI pre‑validates quantities and costs; approval workflows are triggered automatically.

points.title: Disconnected Phases
points.solution: Data flows seamlessly from CPDS → ACCS → AOS – no manual handoffs, no information loss.

whyIndusTech.heading: Why IndusTechSol?
reasons: We don't just digitize – we **operationalize** with a production‑system mindset.
Our ontology covers everything from a billion‑dollar contract down to a single worker (atom).
We are the only platform with **physical AI** that respects the laws of construction.
Trusted by leading EPC firms and infrastructure owners.

footer.tagline: Building the digital backbone for the physical world.
